items.title: We'll take time to get trans guidance right, says minister
items.description: The new code of practice on access to single-sex services cannot gain legal force until it gets sign-off from ministers.

items.title: Trump signs bill ordering US justice department to release Epstein files
items.description: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.

items.title: US military officials in Kyiv as Europe warns against reported Russia peace plan
items.description: It comes after reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly with major concessions from Ukraine.

items.title: Rapist ex-Met officer David Carrick given another life sentence for further sex offences
items.description: David Carrick is sentenced for sexually abusing a 12-year-old girl and raping a former partner.

items.title: Panel split over disallowed Liverpool goal at Man City
items.description: The Premier League's KMI Panel votes 3-2 both that Liverpool's goal should have stood on-field, but didn't reach the VAR threshold.
